attributes.action: make the annually celebrated event 'Armed Forces Day' a public/bank holiday in the UK on 27 June.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Armed Forces Day should be a national public holiday to commemorate the fallen and those who currently serve with HM Armed Forces, both Regular and Reserve.
This day, which coincides with UK Veterans Day, on the 27th June should be a chance for our country to be proud of the men and women who give their lives to protect us, in both past, present and future conflicts. These men and women deserve to be remembered and should be done so on a UK Public Holiday in which events can take place all over the country to remember those who have fallen and those who fight for our right to freedom.

‘We Will Remember Them’
